title: AI Services Enhancement: OpenAI and Google Gemini Support
description: Add support for OpenAI and Google Gemini as commercial AI providers, including backend adapters, model registry, discovery logic, and frontend settings UI enhancements.
acceptance_criteria: OpenAIAdapter and GeminiAdapter implemented in core/adapters_remote.py
Model registry includes GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini, GPT-4 Turbo, Gemini 1.5 Pro, Gemini 1.5 Flash, Gemini 1.0 Pro
Model discovery implemented for OpenAI and Google APIs
AdapterFactory supports initialization of new providers
Settings UI displays all 5 providers (Anthropic, Mistral, Moonshot, OpenAI, Google)
Invalid Anthropic API key removed from .env
notes: This enhancement allows users to connect OpenAI and Google Gemini services, use their models for routing and meta-tasks, and provides clear connection status visibility in the settings panel.
